Trinity News

An Archive from 1953 to 1970
  • Search archive
  • Browse archive
  • Chairs & Editors

A searchable archive of every issue
of Trinity News, from 1953 to 1970.

Clicking search results will download a PDF of that issue. For current issues of Trinity News see trinitynews.ie

Background

This material is available thanks to a donation of five bound volumes by Colin Smythe. Funding to digitise the volumes was generously provided by the TCD Assocation and Trust and the Publications Committee, and was carried out by Glenbeigh Records Management. The project was organised by Martin McKenna (Editor, 2008–9) and launched at the Publications Committee Alumni Dinner in the Atrium on March 25, 2011. It was revised and expanded by Martin and Gear√≥id O'Rourke (Editor. 2007–8) in January 2020.

For more information, please contact info@trinitynewsarchive.ie
